post:
Modules Factory is pleased to announce the release of WhoIsOnline Addon Module v1.0.

With WhoIsOnline module you can Monitor who is online in clientarea, adminarea and custom pages, monitor your referal stats and most viewed pages, monitoring made easy with the realtime adminarea widget. <br /> Module provide the ability to Limit the pages to monitor or to exclude the pages from monitoring with history auto purge and manual purge tools.

[Screenshots & Features ](https://modulesfactory.com/features-whoisonline.php)| [Read more and Order](https://modulesfactory.com/)


Thanks,<br />
Modules Factory.
